document.full_text: an american drone killed 23 people on friday, in a strike against militants that appeared to signify unyielding pressure by the u.s. on pakistan's military.
document.title: deadly drone strike by u.s. may fuel anger in pakistan
lines_and_colors: an american drone killed 23 people on friday, in a strike against militants that appeared to signify unyielding pressure by the u.s. on pakistan's military.
